basics.name: Erik Abrahamson
basics.label: Software Developer
basics.summary: A creative and curious indivudal who loves tinkering with code and digital recipes

work.summary: Become JavaScript ninja and full stack devleoper
highlights: Learn programming fundamentals and the MEAN stack
Worked within creative, operations, marketing, and development teams in an Agile project management setting to administer product life cycle
Managed over fifty portfolio websites overseeing development tasks and various marketing initiatives
Directed training webinars for proprietary CMS for clients and fulfilled client requests on a daily basis
Developed and styled numerous websites with mobile-first, responsive designs
Created monthly corporate roll-up analytic reports containing trends in comprehensive Google Analytics, social media, and email user database metrics

work.summary: Design assets for label printing company
highlights: Digital content management for World Label division; LabelsOnTime.com
Created and managed images for individual product pages to strengthen search engine optimization and UX design
Edited and co-wrote press release, info, and technical specification page for website launch
Created and maintained Google Merchant & AdWords data feed for website
